channel.title: I got 2 Questions, one with spells the other with hosting
channel.description: I would like to know if it is possible to make a spell Admin-only. If so please tell me how also. Another thing I would like to know is how to change which I.P your server starts on. I got himachi but my server always runs on 0.0.0.0 so I cant put it on the server list. If you can answer both, I might consider making you a mod or an admin.

item.title: I got 2 Questions, one with spells the other with hosting
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Lust Blood Lust
item.description:
@Blood_Lust wrote:

I forgot to add, the ip is 5.13.249.7. Im sorry but I don’t have a router so I had to use Himachi, after a few adjustments and snapshots I will post it on the advertisement forum.

Read full topic

item.title: I got 2 Questions, one with spells the other with hosting
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Lust Blood Lust
item.description:
@Blood_Lust wrote:

For the second question answer, I can’t put it up on the server list, it says it must be running while it is. For the first I will search for the tut, also for the other person, im not after a command, I want a spell to be admin only. But thankyou anyway[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 06:02:52 AM[/size][hr]Thank you again for the others who just posted as I was typing.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 06:04:31 AM[/size][hr]Im just testing now, but I will reply after I have eaten dessert[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 06:06:50 AM[/size][hr]Thanks it works (I will make all who helped an admin so remeber, OWNER 2007, kiaz and Yz85Racer, remember, you are admins on BloodScape. It is still in its BETA stage so please be patient.

Read full topic

item.title: I got 2 Questions, one with spells the other with hosting
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:112843”]1) if(command.startsWith(“hi”) && playerRights >= 3)
sendMessage(“Only an admin can execute this command. Hence && playerRights >= 3”);
}[/quote]
He meant spells not commands, and also should the 3’s be 2’s for admins? lolz

Read full topic
